summary: Web App Setup in Cursor with Npm Permissions Fix

content.text: I'll help you install the Claude Code CLI globally. Let me run the npm install command:

content.text: You need sudo permissions to install globally. Try this instead:

input.description: Install Claude Code CLI globally with sudo permissions

content.content:
sudo: a terminal is required to read the password; either use the -S option to read from standard input or configure an askpass helper
sudo: a password is required

toolUseResult:
Error: sudo: a terminal is required to read the password; either use the -S option to read from standard input or configure an askpass helper
sudo: a password is required

content.text:
Since sudo requires interactive password input, you'll need to run this command in your terminal:

```bash
sudo npm install -g @anthropic-ai/claude-code
```

Alternatively, you can use a package manager like Homebrew if you have it installed:

```bash
brew install anthropics/claude/claude
```
